text: The Citroën AX is a car produced by Citroën. It replaced the Citroën LN in late 1986 with the 3-door model and the Citroën Visa in 1987 with the 5-door model although the Visa continued until 1988. It was facelifted in late 1991 and was replaced by the Citroën Saxo in 1996 but the AX continued in some markets until 1998. In Malaysia, it was sold as the Proton Tiara with only a 5-door version from 1996 to 2000. == Engines == * AX 10 31 kW (42 hp) * AX 11 40 kW (54 hp) and 44 kW (60 hp) * AX 14 48 kW (65 hp), 51 kW (69 hp) and 55 kW (75 hp) * AX 14 GT 55 kW (75 hp) and 62 kW (84 hp) * AX Sport 70 kW (95 hp) * AX GTi 70 kW (95 hp) * AX 14 D 37 kW (50 hp) and 39 kW (53 hp) * AX 15 D 43 kW (58 hp) AX Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles
title: Citroën AX
